snippet: Peter Magistro, who runs a company that builds, renovates and manages affordable housing in the Bronx, details what’s good about living there — and what still needs work.
abstract: Interview with Peter Magistro, founder and president of the Bronx Pro Group, family-run company in Morris Park that builds, renovates and manages low- and moderate-income housing in the Bronx; Magistro discusses borough's past and future.
lead_paragraph: Peter Magistro, who runs a company that builds, renovates and manages affordable housing in the Bronx, details what’s good about living there — and what still needs work.

headline.print_headline: Patience and Progress in the Bronx
headline.seo: Debriefing — What’s Great About Living in the Bronx
headline.main: Patience and Progress in the Bronx
